TopicTitle: Pretty Eeloo and concept of future gas giant.

Articles.Content:
I was quite lazy so i didnt make a proper gas giant texture so thats why it looks like Jool and the rings arent too special anyways.

Eeloo and Hygtra(My proposal to the new gas giant) + a nice square render of Eeloo

http://i.imgur.com/qZTwuyG.jpg

and

http://i.imgur.com/MRjaMCR.jpg

I linked them like that so it wont be overtaking the front page with ther size and also reduce lag for people.

Edited June 7, 2013 by Hofugir
I'd love to see a blue gas giant with rings in the future. Nice work!
cool,hope eeloo orbits inside the ring though just to watch the constant impacts.
Wow Eeloo and the blue Gasgiant look really good!
Love it! Would really love a blue gas giant with the Saturnish rings. (as in Saturn -ish)

It would seem that great minds think alike in this case:

I drew this a few months ago in GIMP. I also went to the effort to describe the planet and its two moons (JUST TWO? Yep...), so for those who are interested:

PLANET

Name: Isus

Radius: 5000km

Apoapsis: ~71,000,000km

Periapsis: ~70,000,000km

Inclination: 0.02o

Type: Ice Giant

Atmosphere: Yes

Sea level temperature: 4500K

Upper atmosphere temperature: 12K

Composition:

Ã‚Â· Gases (in lesser quantity than ices): Hydrogen, Helium (or Kerbal equivalents)

Ã‚Â· Ices (in greater quantity than gases): Water, Methane, Ammonia (or Kerbal equivalents)

Atmospheric extension: 4000km from lowest point.

Moons: 2

No liquids present on surface (i.e. lakes, oceans, etc.)

No planetary ring systems (although looking at your pictures may make me reconsider...)

-------------------------------------------------------

MOON

Name: Minduis

Radius: 270km

Apoapsis: 51562km

Periapsis: 50437km

Inclination: 0.5o

Type: Rocky

Atmosphere: Yes

Sea level temperature: 34K

Upper atmosphere temperature: 5K

Composition (Surface):

Ã‚Â· Igneous

Ã‚Â· Metamorphic

Composition (Atmosphere):

Ã‚Â· Gases: Oxygen, Methane, Hydrogen (or Kerbal Equivalents)

Atmospheric extension: 10km from lowest point

No liquids present on surface (i.e. lakes, oceans, etc.)

Craters visible.

-------------------------------------------------------

MOON

Name: Eeloo

Radius: 210km

Apoapsis: 64558km

Periapsis: 49080km

Inclination: 1.7o

Type: Ice/Rocky

Atmosphere: No

Composition:

Ã‚Â· Ices: Water, Methane, Ammonia (or Kerbal Equivalent)

Ã‚Â· Igneous

Ice sheets with small exposures of rocky surface

-------------------------------------------------------

The moon, Minduis, is visible in the picture. Eeloo would be on the opposite side of the planet. So, a blue gas giant which captured Eeloo from its hideous orbit? Like I said, great minds think alike

So, a blue gas giant which captured Eeloo from its hideous orbit? Like I said, great minds think alike

Well i read some time ago where NovaSilisko said that Eeloo was gonna be a moon of the second gas giant but he had no time i think but anyways i decided to make it now.

Also, Eeloo was supposed to have an atmosphere but it is to small so Unity kinda went bonkers i guess.(Duna is about minimum atmosphere size.
Yeah, Nova did indeed mention a new gas giant that Eeloo was destined to orbit. He even showed teaser screenshots of it.

Yeah, Nova did indeed mention a new gas giant that Eeloo was destined to orbit. He even showed teaser screenshots of it.

Do you happen to have links to said screenshots?

Do you happen to have links to said screenshots?

I can do one better, actually. Maybe. I was watching live and screengrabbed it. I'll rummage around on my computer and reup it if I can find it again. I know it's already on my imgur account but I blew past the 225 image limit months ago so I can't see it and link it that way.

Thank god I never delete anything, eh?

edit: Yup. There it was. Wasn't even hiding either.

Edited June 14, 2013 by Kenobi McCormick

Oh, oh yeah!

I hope it has rings!
Nice pics. Sure hope it looks like that.

Since Eeloo is the farthest planetary body it is the coldest and most snowyest? so a blue gas giant symbolising the cold is my basic idea, Would still love to see what Nova will give us. He is a planet forger after all.
I really want this in the game.
If any planets have rings in the future, I hope said planet is on an angle and not dead straight.
Nova did say that the next gas giant is going to have rings like Saturn so your in luck! It's also going to be bigger than Jool and have a moon that spins extremely fast as well as eeloo.

Nova did say that the next gas giant is going to have rings like Saturn so your in luck! It's also going to be bigger than Jool and have a moon that spins extremely fast as well as eeloo.

That i knew, is why i made this because i want a grey ringed blue gas giant.
I can't wait until these new planets get implemented!
